com.att.aro.main
Class ProfileManager

java.lang.Object
  com.att.aro.main.ProfileManager

public class ProfileManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the saving and retrieving of device profiles.

                                    ProfileException

Parameters:
name - The name of a pre-defined profile returned by the getPredefinedProfileNames() method.
Returns:
The pre-defined profile, or null, if the profile is not found.

                           throws ProfileException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Gets the last profile used for the analysis.

Returns:
A Profile object that is the last profile used.
Throws:
ProfileException - - If data in the profile is corrupt.
java.io.IOException - - If the application is unable to load the profile.
